attributes.action: to create a csa that allows non resident parents the right to provide food ,clothes vouchers etc instead of cash that may not get used for the good of are children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to see a fairer way to pay why provide just cash that can be used for hoildays drink cars anything bar the children why not have vouchers for food clothes or more items taken into acount ie when parents already pay for school trips shoes sports equipment etc many thanks
